channel.title: How do I
channel.description:
How do I set max players? When I change the playerhandler.java to like 20 it always crashes when the server gets 20 people.
Base: Pimpscape.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 07:47:48 PM[/size][hr]Will anyone help?

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

Mrquarter:

I think you are being crashed.

I don’t think so…this only happens when I set a max…[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 10:28:29 PM[/size][hr]Is there anyway at all to fix?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

I think you are being crashed.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Ok … wow that is seriously messed up. I have seen this kind of error before, but not known what it meant. Apparently, from researching where those errors have occured, all I can say is that your server is printing message to System.out “too fast” …

Read full topic
